<template>
  <select class="border border-dropshiphub-primary-500 rounded-md px-2 py-0.5" @change="changeLanguage" :value="currentLocale">
    <option value="nl">Nederlands</option>
    <option value="en">English</option>
  </select>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'LanguageSwitcher',
  computed: {
    currentLocale() {
      return this.$i18n.locale.value;
    }
  },
  mounted() {
  const savedLocale = localStorage.getItem('locale');
  if (savedLocale) {
    this.$i18n.changeLanguage(savedLocale);
    this.updateRoute(savedLocale);
  } else {
    this.$i18n.changeLanguage('nl');
    localStorage.setItem('locale', 'nl');
    this.updateRoute('nl');
  }
},
methods: {
  changeLanguage(event) {
    const selectedLocale = event.target.value;
    this.$i18n.changeLanguage(selectedLocale);
    localStorage.setItem('locale', selectedLocale);
    this.updateRoute(selectedLocale);
  },
  updateRoute(locale) {
    const currentPath = this.$route.path;
    const pathWithoutLocale = currentPath.replace(/^\/(en|nl)/, '');
    
    if (locale === 'nl') {
      this.$router.push(pathWithoutLocale);
    } else {
      this.$router.push(`/${locale}${pathWithoutLocale}`);
    }
  }
}
,
  methods: {
    changeLanguage(event) {
      const selectedLocale = event.target.value;
      this.$i18n.changeLanguage(selectedLocale);
      localStorage.setItem('locale', selectedLocale); // Save the selected locale to localStorage
      
      // Update the route based on the selected locale
      this.updateRoute(selectedLocale);
    },
    updateRoute(locale) {
      const currentPath = this.$route.path;

      if (locale === 'nl') {
        // Remove '/en' from the path if it exists
        const newPath = currentPath.replace('/en', '');
        this.$router.push(newPath);
      } else {
        // Add '/en' to the path if it does not exist
        const newPath = `/en${currentPath.replace('/en', '')}`;
        this.$router.push(newPath);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
